    Cut Cut Cut

Convert numeric to factor weighted and by group

Source: R/cut3.R
cut3.Rd

Convert numeric to factor weighted and by group

Usage

cut3(tbl, var_name, breaks, groups = NULL, bf_args = list(), .inf = FALSE, ...)

Arguments

tbl

data.frame: Database connection or data.frame

var_name

character: variable name

breaks

numeric: break points. See base::cut

groups

character: name of a groups variable

bf_args

list: arguments to be passed to break function

.inf

logical: indicates if the breaks need to be extended by -Inf and Inf

...

argument passed to base::cut

Value

same as tbl input with var_name converted to factor

See also

vignette("cut3", package = "Dmisc") base::cut

Examples

datos <- data.frame(edad = seq(1:100))
cut3(datos, "edad", 5)
#>             edad
#> 1   (0.901,20.8]
#> 2   (0.901,20.8]
#> 3   (0.901,20.8]
